name: astro-blog-starter-template
description: Build a personal website, blog, or portfolio with Astro.

scripts.db:seed:local: bun scripts/generate-seed.ts && wrangler d1 execute see-in-the-sea-db --local --file=./drizzle/seed.sql
scripts.db:seed:remote: bun scripts/generate-seed.ts && wrangler d1 execute see-in-the-sea-db --remote --file=./drizzle/seed.sql
scripts.db:init:local: bun run db:migration initial_schema && bun run db:migrate:local && bun run db:seed:local
scripts.db:init:remote: bun run db:migration initial_schema && bun run db:migrate:remote && bun run db:seed:remote
scripts.db:dump:local: bunx wrangler d1 execute see-in-the-sea-db --local --command="DROP TABLE IF EXISTS submissions;" && bunx wrangler d1 execute see-in-the-sea-db --local --command="DROP TABLE IF EXISTS categories;" && bunx wrangler d1 execute see-in-the-sea-db --local --command="DROP TABLE IF EXISTS contests;"
scripts.db:dump:remote: bunx wrangler d1 execute see-in-the-sea-db --remote --command="DROP TABLE IF EXISTS submissions;" && bunx wrangler d1 execute see-in-the-sea-db --remote --command="DROP TABLE IF EXISTS categories;" && bunx wrangler d1 execute see-in-the-sea-db --remote --command="DROP TABLE IF EXISTS contests;"
scripts.db:dump:all: bun run db:dump:local && bun run db:dump:remote
scripts.db:reset:local: bun run db:dump:local && bun run db:init:local
scripts.db:reset:remote: bun run db:dump:remote && bun run db:init:remote
scripts.db:reset: bun run db:dump:all && bun run db:init:local && bun run db:init:remote
